pullrequest.title: Fix disabled button state in new tabs

content.raw:
sometimes the attached() is invoked before the onTokenUpdated, and sometimes onTokenUpdated is invoked before attached(). The _getSimData() method checks if there is a valid token and, if not, it rejects.
I'm pushing some changes to also react onTokenUpdated and to add more dev documentation.
content.html: sometimes the attached() is invoked before the onTokenUpdated, and sometimes onTokenUpdated is invoked before attached(). The _getSimData() method checks if there is a valid token and, if not, it rejects. I'm pushing some changes to also react onTokenUpdated and to add more dev documentation.
